General.Name: Muhak Co. Ltd
General.Description: Muhak Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells liquors in South Korea. It offers diluted shochu products, fruit liquors, and liqueurs. The company was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Changwon, South Korea.
General.Address: Bong-am Industrial Complex 2, Changwon-Si, South Korea

1.Title: VP, Head of Overall Metropolitan Region Bus. Division & Representative Director
